text: The women's lightweight coxless pair competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Tuesday 27 August 2019 || 11:34 || Test race |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| Friday 30 August 2019 || style=background:lemonchiffon| 14:47 || style=background:lemonchiffon| Final |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Test race=== With fewer than seven entries in this event, boats contested a race for lanes before the final. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time |- | 1 | align="left"|Margaret Bertasi Cara Stawicki | align="left"| | 7:35.46 |- | 2 | align="left"|Sofia Tanghetti Maria Ludovica Costa | align="left"| | 7:36.39 |- | 3 | align="left"|Janika Kölblin Marie-Christine Gerhardt | align="left"| | 7:49.52 |- | 4 | align="left"|Tatjana Grigorjeva Ludmila Ivanova | align="left"| | 8:05.02 |} ===Final=== The final determined the rankings. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time |- | | align="left"|Margaret Bertasi Cara Stawicki | align="left"| | 7:32.64 |- | | align="left"|Sofia Tanghetti Maria Ludovica Costa | align="left"| | 7:34.20 |- | | align="left"|Janika Kölblin Marie-Christine Gerhardt | align="left"| | 7:37.72 |- | 4 | align="left"|Tatjana Grigorjeva Ludmila Ivanova | align="left"| | 8:03.78 |} ==References== Category:2019 World Rowing Championships World
title: 2019 World Rowing Championships – Women's lightweight coxless pair
